Condor::

Condor:

Condor heard the alarm, "Well I have to do a thing... RUN!!!"

The male run towards the exit of the base. He took off and his 
jetpack let him starting left the enemy base.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Sure thats fine.
> 
> BIC:
> Condor now entered a large coridoor, on the right was a door, which 
voices
> could be heard from. Squawktalk flew out of it, but was to busy to 
notice
> Condor, (Soulstice, tell me if you mind me stating this), down the
> cooridor, sunlight can be seen, as well as the exit of the base.
> 
> 
> "So have we broken youre spirit Maximal, ha hash ha" Wildrider 
cackles to
> himself as he rounds the corner to look inside the cell. Then there 
was
> silence, except for his cube droping onto the ground. Wildrider's 
mangled
> face showed a combination of emotions, suprise, awe, fear, and 
anger. "How
> in the pit did that freagin Maximal, I mean" he was confused, but 
his
> emotions turned totally to anger. He backed up slowly, then whirled 
around
> bringing his fist against a red button on the wall. A soon as he 
touched
> the button, lights started to flicker red everywhere in the base. 
The
> computer voice started to cry "EMERGENCY", Wildrider opened his 
comm to
> Motormater, "We've got a problem boss".
> 
> 
> By the way, this emergency is happening all over the base everyone.
